document.title: PB1522-Preparing for Honey Bee Emergencies in Tennessee

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract:
Life-threatening, bee-related situations are rare, but they do occur. Some situations require immediate response, while others are less serious, requiring an operator to answer a question or refer the call elsewhere.

Uncertainty causes delay that may cost the victimâ€™s life. A response must be made quickly, because a person could receive hundreds of stings in a few minutes.
document.publication-title: Insects, Pests, Plant Diseases and Weeds
